title: User-Centric Privacy Controls – User-Friendly Privacy Settings Interface
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a straightforward and intuitive interface for privacy settings so that I can feel secure and in control of my personal information without feeling monitored.

title: Adaptive System Configuration – Guided Onboarding with Voice Assistance
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want an intuitive onboarding process with voice assistance so that I can easily set up ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to seamlessly integrate with my wearable health monitors so that I can easily track my health data and receive timely reminders without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Voice-Driven Cognitive Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to use voice commands to access cognitive stimulation games and receive reminders about my appointments, so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and stay organized without feeling monitored.

title: User Feedback Mechanism – Simple Voice Feedback Collection Prompts
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to provide feedback on my experience using ALFRED through simple voice prompts so that I can help improve the system without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Accessibility Compliance Assurance through Diverse User Testing for Older Adults
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want the ALFRED system to be tested for accessibility by diverse users so that I can confidently use the technology without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.
